Vidyasagar Rao | 30 August 2014 – Present |} == General Elections == ===Lok Sabha=== Results for General elections to Lok Sabha was declared on 17 May 2014. Outcomes were as follows: {| class=wikitable |- ! ! Party ! Constituencies ! Won |- align="center | 100px | BJP | 18 | 18 |- align="center | 100px | SHS | 16 | 16 |- | 100px | INC | 2 | 2 |- | 100px | NCP | 4 | 4 |} == Events == ===October=== * 15 October 2014: 2014 Maharashtra Legislative Assembly election * 30 October 2014: Devendra Fadnavis sworn in as the 18th Chief Minister of Maharashtra. ==References==
title: 2014 in Maharashtra
